outputs.name: Message
outputs.value: Greetings, traveler. What brings you to our humble village?

outputs.name: Option 1
outputs.value: I seek information about the ancient ruins to the east.

outputs.name: bandits
outputs.value: I'm looking for work. Are there any problems in the village I can help with?

outputs.name: Option 3
outputs.value: I'm just passing through, no specific purpose.

outputs.name: Link 1
outputs.value: bandits-quest-complete

outputs.name: Link 2
outputs.value: forest-quest-complete

outputs.name: Link 3
outputs.value: caves-quest-complete

outputs.name: Message
outputs.value: Ah, the ruins, a place of great mystery and danger. I can tell you what I know, but you must promise to be cautious.

outputs.name: Option 1
outputs.value: Tell me what you know about the ruins.

outputs.name: Option 2
outputs.value: I'll take my chances. Give me directions to the ruins.

outputs.name: Message
outputs.value: The ruins are said to hold a powerful artefact, but they are also guarded by ancient spirits.

outputs.name: Message
outputs.value: Very well, head east through the forest. You'll know you're getting close when you see the old stone markers. But remember, you've been warned.

outputs.name: Message
outputs.value: Well, we have been having issues with a group of bandits lately. If you're willing to lend a hand, we can offer a reward.

outputs.name: Option 1
outputs.value: I'll deal with the bandits.

outputs.name: Option 2
outputs.value: I need more information about these bandits first.

outputs.name: Message
outputs.value: Thank you, brave traveler. Go to the [color=blue][b]Town Guard[/b][/color] for more details.

outputs.name: Message
outputs.value: The bandits are led by a ruthless outlaw known as Red-Eye. They've been terrorizing our trade routes and stealing from our farmers. We'd be grateful for your help. Go talk to the [color=blue][b]Town Guard[/b][/color], he will give you more information.

outputs.name: Message
outputs.value: That's perfectly fine. Feel free to rest in our inn or explore our village. If you change your mind, don't hesitate to seek our guidance.

outputs.name: Option 1
outputs.value: Tell me about your village. Do you have any interesting places or people here?

outputs.name: Option 2
outputs.value: I may not have a purpose now, but perhaps I'll stay a while and see what happens.

outputs.name: Option 3
outputs.value: Do you have any rumors or local legends to share?

outputs.name: Message
outputs.value: Indeed, we have a bustling market square, a renowned blacksmith, and a skilled alchemist. Our tavern keeper has many tales to share, and you may find the local bard entertaining as well.

outputs.name: Message
outputs.value: A wise choice. Sometimes the most unexpected adventures come to those who wait. Enjoy your stay, and feel free to ask for advice or assistance at any time.

outputs.name: Message
outputs.value: Ah, well, there is a tale of a hidden treasure in the nearby forest. It's said to be protected by a riddle. Many have tried to find it, but no one has succeeded. Perhaps you'd like to try your luck?
